mapper.select: select userno, email, pw, name, tel, addr, ispro from user
select userno, email, pw, name, tel, addr, ispro from user where name = #{name}
select uid, email, password, create_date from user where email = #{email} and password = #{password}
select userno, email, pw, name, tel, addr, ispro from user where email = #{email} and name = #{username}
select userno, email, pw, name, tel, addr, ispro from user where email = #{email}
select userno, email, pw, name, tel, addr, ispro from user where tel = #{tel}
